thread.title: Farida Jalal not DEAD; the veteran actress slams hoax reports by calling it irritating
thread.title_full: Farida Jalal not DEAD; the veteran actress slams hoax reports by calling it irritating

author: karthika raveendran
title: Farida Jalal not DEAD; the veteran actress slams hoax reports by calling it irritating
text:
Farida Jalal not DEAD; the… Farida Jalal not DEAD; the veteran actress slams hoax reports by calling it irritating Farida Jalal is NOT dead. By karthika raveendran | Updated: February 20, 2017 10:41 am comments 
When it comes to social media, spreading fake news around is not uncommon anymore. The latest buzz was the fake news of Farida Jalal ‘s death that had Twitter and Facebook buzzing like crazy since last evening. But how did this news spread? Well, someone happened to update her wikipedia page with her death news and that was enough for the news to spread. Fans all around started to mourn her death, paying tribute to the much loved actress. But guys, we all can calm down because she in fact is NOT dead. Sources have confirmed as per leading portals, that she was having dinner last evening. On hearing her fake death news, the veteran actress reacted herself as per reports on DNA,”I don’t know from where these baseless rumours are coming from. Initially I laughed, but from last 30 mins my phone have been constantly ringing and everybody is asking the same question. It’s a bit irritating, I wonder why people spread such rumours.” She is not the first first celebrity to have been a target of the death hoax. Before this there have been other celebrities – Dilip Kumar, Yo Yo Honey Singh to name a few. 
Farida Jalal will soon be seen in (TV actor) Imran Khan’s Sargoshiyan where she plays a Kashmiri. Farida Jalal is one of our senior most actors who epitomised the concept of a loving, understanding mother in Bollywood in the 90s. Her role in DDLJ cannot be forgotten. In fact, she won a Filmfare award for that memorable performance. She is also well known for her role on TV in the popular series – Shararat. The actress has worked in nearly 200 films and has also worked across multiple languages. 
Take a look at the update on a Wikipedia page that caused the furore. 
(Photo credit: filmymonkey.com)
